content.raw:
Currently publishing to the `~/arrange` topic does not affect the `arat_case`. There's two options to fix this:

1. Call `Reset world` in tandem with publishing to `~/arrange`
1. Modify the plugin sdf tags in `arat.world` to declare the position of `arat_case` for each arrangement.

The first option seems much easier to me.
